The current source puts out an impulse of area \(A = 2/\pi = $Aimpulse\)C at time \(t = $timpulse\)s.
At \(t=0\) the state is: \(v_C(0) = $v0\) and \(i_L(0) = $i0\).

\( \frac{d^2 i_L(t)}{dt^2} + \frac{1}{LC} i_L(t) = \frac{A}{LC}\delta(t-$timpulse) \)
